items: [#8] Update button not working as expected for some devices — Issued by @afyef. Fixed inconsistent behavior of the update button on certain iOS devices. (to be tested)

items: [#6] Set season as watched — Issued by @SimSalabimse. Added functionality to mark an entire season as watched.
